description:
Kaito and the others come back to Big Money District for the first time in ages to a big surprise: Shishio Torai has become the prime minister! Ai and Zouan follow him obediently for fear of his overbearing behavior and the punishments for disobeying his laws. When Kaito and gang learn what is going on and rebel, Torai ups the ante even further! He holds an emergency press conference and makes a startling announcement!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Absolute Obedience! Do as Torai-sama Says!!
絶対服従 ￥ 虎井様の言う通り!!
